Package SchwartzSet

MapReduce program to compute the SchwartzSet.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    FirstMap
    This is the Map Method for the first Mapreduce Round of the computation of the Schwartzset.
    IntArrayWritable
    Datatype containing an array of IntWritables.
    LastMap
    Last Map Method of the Schwartzset Computation.
    LastReduce
    This last reduce method collects all vertices contained in the Schwartzset.
    MapVertex
    Reads each vertex and emits values to the reducer.
    ReduceVertex
    ReduceVertex combines all arrays of vertices with mode neu, old and reachby to a new vertex (VertexWritable).
    SchwartzSet
    The MapReduce program for computing the SchwartzSet.
    VertexArrayWritable
    Contains an array of IntWritables together with a mode ((1)new, (2)old or (3)reachedBy).
    VertexWritable
    For a given vertex (v) the VertexWritable contains arrays of vertices IntArrayWritable that can be reached from v (old and neu) and vertices that are known to reach v (reachedBy).

Package SchwartzSet Description

MapReduce program to compute the SchwartzSet. The algorithm implemented in this package is proposed in the AAAI-17 paper "Winner Determination in Huge Elections with MapReduce".

The main class Schwartzset() contains the MapReduce program.
Since:
September 2016
Version:
1.0
